name: Upper Yard
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with the (Sky Island) type and add it to your hand. Then, place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck, reveal up to 1 card with the (Sky Island) type and add it to your hand. Then, place the remaining cards at the bottom of your deck in any order.
